mapper.select: SELECT meet_no, meet_poster, meet_subject,meet_start,meet_end,meet_price,meet_total,meet_limit,meet_hit,meet_regdate,num FROM(SELECT meet_no, meet_poster, meet_subject,meet_start,meet_end,meet_price,meet_total,meet_limit,meet_hit,meet_regdate,rownum as num FROM(SELECT meet_no, meet_poster, meet_subject,meet_start,meet_end,meet_price,meet_total,meet_limit,meet_hit,meet_regdate FROM meeting WHERE om_id = #{om_hid} ORDER BY meet_no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/5) FROM meeting WHERE om_id = #{om_hid}
SELECT meet_no,meet_poster, meet_subject,meet_start,meet_end,meet_price,meet_total,meet_limit,meet_hit,meet_regdate FROM meeting WHERE om_id = #{om_hid} ORDER BY meet_no DESC

SELECT m.om_name,a.om_id, m.om_tel, m.om_company, a.ac_regdate FROM meeting mt, application a, oim_member m WHERE a.meet_no = #{meet_no} AND m.om_id=a.om_id AND mt.meet_no = a.meet_no AND mt.om_id = #{om_hid} ORDER BY ac_no ASC

SELECT mt.meet_no,mt.meet_poster, mt.meet_subject, mt.meet_start, mt.meet_end, mt.meet_loc, mt.meet_price, a.ac_regdate,a.ac_no FROM meeting mt, application a WHERE a.om_id = #{id} AND mt.meet_no = a.meet_no
